text: [BELLS RINGING]

♪ SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMAS
MEN WON'T BE BOYS ♪

♪ PLAYING WITH BOMBS LIKE
KIDS PLAY WITH TOYS ♪

♪ ONE WARM DECEMBER
OUR HEARTS WILL SEE ♪
♪ A WORLD WHERE MEN ARE FREE ♪

♪ SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMAS
THERE'LL BE NO WARS ♪

♪ WHEN WE HAVE LEARNED
WHAT CHRISTMAS IS FOR ♪

♪ WHEN WE HAVE FOUND WHAT
LIFE'S REALLY WORTH ♪
♪ THERE'LL BE PEACE ON EARTH ♪

♪ SOMEDAY ALL OUR
DREAMS WILL COME TO BE ♪

♪ SOMEDAY IN A WORLD
WHERE MEN ARE FREE ♪

♪ MAYBE NOT IN TIME
FOR YOU AND ME ♪
♪ BUT SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMASTIME ♪

♪ SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMAS
WE'LL SEE A MAN ♪

♪ NO HUNGRY CHILDREN
AND NO EMPTY HAND ♪

♪ ONE HAPPY MORNING
PEOPLE WILL SHARE ♪
♪ A WORLD WHERE PEOPLE CARE ♪

♪ SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMAS
THERE'LL BE NO TEARS ♪

♪ ALL MEN ARE EQUAL
AND NO MAN HAVE FEARS ♪

♪ ONE SHINING MOMENT
MY HEART RAN AWAY ♪
♪ FROM OUR WORLD TODAY ♪

♪ SOMEDAY ALL OUR
DREAMS WILL COME TO BE ♪

♪ SOMEDAY IN A WORLD
WHERE MEN ARE FREE ♪

♪ MAYBE NOT IN TIME
FOR YOU AND ME ♪
♪ BUT SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMASTIME ♪

♪ SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMAS
MAN WILL NOT FAIL ♪

♪ TAKE HOPE BECAUSE
YOUR LOVE WILL PREVAIL ♪

♪ SOMEDAY A NEW WORLD
THAT WE CAN START ♪
♪ WITH HOPE IN EVERY HEART ♪

♪ SOMEDAY ALL OUR
DREAMS WILL COME TO BE ♪

♪ SOMEDAY IN A WORLD
WHERE MEN ARE FREE ♪

♪ MAYBE NOT IN TIME
FOR YOU AND ME ♪
♪ BUT SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMASTIME ♪
♪ SOMEDAY AT CHRISTMASTIME ♪
